summary: This code provides suggestions for similar tools and technologies for inspection, static analysis, metaprogramming, editor recovery, and mentions making an alias for nvim and installing webtelnet via npm.

details.comment: This code provides suggestions for similar tools and technologies for inspection, static analysis, metaprogramming, editor recovery, and mentions making an alias for nvim and installing webtelnet via npm.
details.content:
similar tool for inspection:
language server
static analysis (jedi for python)
reflection (metaprogramming)
editor recovery:
#.*(#) for emacs, .*swp for vim
shall make alias for nvim
npm i -g webtelnet
